:::HeraldAngle, still unfazed by the spectacular form of ArcAngle, says:::

"The first thing you should do is disconnect from the vok, you may think you 
already have but that is not true, go to Easter Island and destroy the head 
that most resembles you. Then retune to me to learn your new skills."
